text: Recke is a municipality in the district of Steinfurt, in North Rhine- Westphalia, Germany. == Geography == Recke is about north-east of Rheine and north-west of Osnabrück. === Municipalities near Recke === * Ibbenbüren * Hopsten * Mettingen * Voltlage * Neuenkirchen ==Twin town== * Ommen (Overijssel, Netherlands) ==References== ==Other websites== * Official site Category:Steinfurt (district)
title: Recke
